entry.title: 数学知识（二）
entry.content:
组合数I

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 2005, mod = 1e9 + 7;int c[N][N];signed main() {    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {        for (int j = 0; j <= i; j++) {            if (!j) c[i][j] = 1;            else c[i][j] = (c[i - 1][j] + c[i - 1][j - 1]) % mod;        }    }    int n;    cin >> n;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int a, b;        cin >> a >> b;        cout << c[a][b] << endl;    }    return 0;}

组合数II

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long long const int N = 1e5 + 5, mod = 1e9 + 7;int fact[N], infact[N];int qpow(int a, int b, int p) {    int res = 1;    while (b) {        if (b & 1) res = res * a % p;        b >>= 1;        a = a * a % p;    }    return res;}signed main() {    fact[0] = infact[0] = 1;    for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) {        fact[i] = fact[i - 1] * i % mod;        infact[i] = infact[i - 1] * qpow(i, mod - 2, mod) % mod;    }    int n;    cin >> n;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int a, b;        cin >> a >> b;        cout << fact[a] * infact[b] % mod * infact[a - b] % mod << endl;    }    return 0;}

组合数III

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longint p;int qpow(int a, int b) {    int res = 1;    while (b) {        if (b & 1) res = res * a % p;        b >>= 1;        a = a * a % p;    }    return res;}int C(int a, int b) {    int res = 1;    for (int i = 1, j = a; i <= b; i++, j--) {        res = res * j * qpow(i, p - 2) % p;    }    return res;}int lucas(int a, int b) {    if (a < p && b < p) return C(a, b);    else return C(a % p, b % p) * lucas(a / p, b / p) % p;}signed main() {    int t;    cin >> t;    while (t--) {        int a, b;        cin >> a >> b >> p;        cout << lucas(a, b) << endl;    }    return 0;}

组合数IV

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int N = 5005;int primes[N];bool st[N];int sum[N];int cnt;void get_primes(int n) {    for (int i = 2; i < n; i++) {        if (!st[i]) primes[cnt++] = i;        for (int j = 0; primes[j] <= n / i; j++) {            st[primes[j] * i] = true;            if (i % primes[j] == 0) break;        }    }}int get(int n, int p) {    int res = 0;    while (n) {        res += n / p;        n /= p;    }    return res;}vector<int> mul(vector<int> a, int b) {    vector<int> res;    int t = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {        t += a[i] * b;        res.push_back(t % 10);        t /= 10;    }    while (t) {        res.push_back(t % 10);        t /= 10;    }    return res;}signed main() {    int a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    get_primes(N);    for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++) {        int p = primes[i];        sum[i] = get(a, p) - get(b, p) - get(a - b, p);    }    vector<int> ans;    ans.push_back(1);    for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < sum[i]; j++) {            ans = mul(ans, primes[i]);        }    }    for (int i = ans.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << ans[i];    return 0;}

卡特兰数

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long long const int mod = 1e9 + 7;int qpow(int a, int b) {    int res = 1;    while (b) {        if (b & 1) res = res * a % mod;        b >>= 1;        a = a * a % mod;    }    return res;}signed main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    int a = 2 * n, b = n;    int res = 1;    for (int i = a; i > a - b; i--) res = res * i % mod;    for (int i = 1; i <= b; i++) res = res * qpow(i, mod - 2) % mod;    res = res * qpow(n + 1, mod - 2) % mod;    cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

entry.title: 拓扑排序
entry.content:
拓扑排序

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int q[N], d[N];int hh = 0, tt = 0;int n, m;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}bool topsort() {    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (d[i] == 0) q[tt++] = i;    }    while (hh <= tt) {        int u = q[hh++];        for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (d[j]) {                d[j]--;                if (d[j] == 0) {                    q[tt++] = j;                }            }        }    }    return  tt == n;}int main() {    cin >> n >> m;    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i =  0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b;        cin >> a >> b;        add(a, b);        d[b]++;    }    if(topsort()) {        for (int i = 0; i < tt; i++) {            cout << q[i] << " ";        }    } else cout << "-1";    return 0;}

entry.title: 最短路
entry.content:
Dijkstra

朴素版Dijkstra

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 510;int g[N][N];int dist[N];bool st[N];int n, m;int dijkstra() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {        int t = -1;        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            if (!st[j] && (t == -1 || dist[t] > dist[j])) {                t = j;            }        }        st[t] = true;        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            dist[j] = min(dist[j], dist[t] + g[t][j]);        }    }    if (dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f) return -1;     return dist[n];}int main() {    cin >> n >> m;    memset(g, 0x3f, sizeof g);    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        int x, y, z;        cin >> x >> y >> z;        g[x][y] = min(g[x][y], z);    }    int ans = dijkstra();    cout << ans << endl;    return 0;}

堆优化版Dijkstra

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 150010;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondint n, m;int h[N], w[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int dist[N];bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c) {    e[idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int dijkstra() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    priority_queue<pii, vector<pii>, greater<pii>> heap;    heap.push({0, 1});    while (heap.size()) {        pii t = heap.top();        heap.pop();        if (st[t.se]) continue;        st[t.se] = true;        for (int i = h[t.se]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (dist[j] > t.fi + w[i]) {                dist[j] = t.fi + w[i];                heap.push({dist[j], j});            }        }    }    if (dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f) return -1;    else return dist[n];}int main() {    cin >> n >> m;    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b, c;        cin >> a >> b >> c;        add(a, b, c);    }    cout << dijkstra() << endl;    return 0;}

bellman-ford

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 510;const int M = 10010;struct Edge {    int a, b, c;}edges[M];int n, m, k;int dist[N], backup[N];int Bellman_Ford() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {        memcpy(backup, dist, sizeof dist);        for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {            Edge e = edges[j];            dist[e.b] = min(dist[e.b], backup[e.a] + e.c);         }    }    if (dist[n] > 0x3f3f3f3f / 2) return -1;    else return dist[n];}int main() {    cin >> n >> m >> k;    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b, c;        cin >> a >> b >> c;        edges[i] = {a, b, c};    }    int t = Bellman_Ford();    if (t == -1) cout << "impossible" << endl;    else cout << t << endl;    return 0;}

spfa

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], w[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int n, m;int dist[N];bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c) {    e[idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int spfa() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    queue<int> q;    q.push(1);    st[1] = true;    while (q.size()) {        int u = q.front();        q.pop();        st[u] = false;        for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (dist[j] > dist[u] + w[i]) {                dist[j] = dist[u] + w[i];                if (!st[j]) {                    q.push(j);                    st[j] = true;                }            }        }    }    if (dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f) return -1;    else return dist[n];}int main() {    cin >> n >> m;    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    while (m--) {        int a, b, c;        cin >> a >> b >> c;        add(a, b, c);    }    int ans = spfa();    if (ans == -1) cout << "impossible" << endl;    else cout << ans << endl;    return 0;}

Floyd

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 210;const int INF = 1e9;int g[N][N];int n, m, Q;void floyd() {    for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++) {        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {                g[i][j] =  min(g[i][j], g[i][k] + g[k][j]);            }        }    }}int main() {    cin >> n >> m >> Q;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            if (i != j) g[i][j] = INF;        }    }    while (m--) {        int a, b, c;        cin >> a >> b >> c;        g[a][b] = min(g[a][b], c);    }    floyd();    while (Q--) {        int a, b;        cin >> a >> b;        if (g[a][b] > INF / 2) cout << "impossible" << endl;        else cout << g[a][b] << endl;    }    return 0;}

entry.title: 手写堆
entry.content:
小根堆

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], ph[N], hp[N], idx;void heap_swap(int a, int b) {    swap(h[a], h[b]);    swap(ph[hp[a]], ph[hp[b]]);    swap(hp[a], hp[b]);}void down(int u) {    int t = u;    if (u * 2 <= idx && h[u * 2] < h[t]) {        t = u * 2;    }     if (u * 2 + 1 <= idx && h[u * 2 + 1] < h[t]) {        t = u * 2 + 1;    }    if (u != t) {        heap_swap(u, t);        down(t);    }} void up(int u) {    while (u / 2 && h[u] < h[u / 2]) {        heap_swap(u, u / 2);        u /= 2;    }} int main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    int m = 0;    while (n--) {        string op;        int x, k;        cin >> op;        if (op == "I") {            cin >> x;            idx++, m++;            h[idx] = x;            ph[m] = idx, hp[idx] = m;            up(idx);        } else if (op == "PM") {            cout << h[1] << endl;        } else if (op == "DM") {            heap_swap(1, idx);            idx--;            down(1);        } else if (op == "D") {            cin >> k;            k = ph[k];            heap_swap(k, idx);            idx--;            down(k), up(k);        } else {            cin >> k >> x;            k = ph[k];            h[k] = x;            down(k), up(k);        }     }    return 0;}

entry.title: 二叉树的建立
entry.content:
给前序和中序建立二叉树

const int N = 60;int pre[N], in[N];int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;int reduce(int ps, int is, int ie) {    int u = pre[ps];    v[++idx] = u;    int id = idx, k = 0;    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {        if (in[i] == u) break;        k++;    }    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps + 1, is, is + k - 1);    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k + 1, is + k + 1, ie);    return id;}

给后序和中序建二叉树

const int N = 60;int in[N], post[N];int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;int reduce(int ps, int pe, int is, int ie) {    int u = post[pe];    v[++idx] = u;    int id = idx, k = 0;    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {        if (in[i] == u) break;        k++;    }    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps, ps + k - 1, is, is + k - 1);    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k, pe - 1, is + k + 1, ie);    return id;}

entry.title: POJ2503-Babelfish
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

给出字典，然后根据字典给出询问的答案

解题思路

运用STL中的map建立映射，难点在于输入

题解代码

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <map>#include <cstring>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;int main() {    map<string, string> h;    char a[15], b[15], s[30];    while (gets(s) && s[0] != '\0') {        sscanf(s, "%s%s", a, b);        h[b] = a;    }    while (gets(s)) {        if (h.find(s) != h.end()) {            cout << h[s] << endl;        } else cout << "eh" << endl;    }    return 0;}

entry.title: C++STL用法大全
entry.content:
vector

stack

queue

map

set

entry.title: 数学知识（一）
entry.content:
质数

试除法判断质数

bool is_prime(int x) {    if (x < 2) return false;    for (int i = 2; i <= x / i; i++) {        if (x % i == 0) return false;    }    return true;}

埃氏筛法

int p[N], cnt;bool st[N];int prime(int x) {    for (int i = 2; i <= x; i++) {        if (!st[i]) {            p[cnt++] = i;            for (int j = i + i; j <= x; j += i) {                st[j] = true;            }        }    } }

线性筛法

int primes[N];bool st[N];void get_primes(int n) {    int cnt = 0;    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {        if (!st[i]) primes[cnt++] = i;        for (int j = 0; primes[j] <= n / i; j++) {            st[primes[j] * i] = true;            if (i % primes[j] == 0) break;        }    } }

质因数分解

void fac(int x) {    for (int i = 2; i <= x / i; i++) {        if (x % i == 0) {            int e = 0;            while (x % i == 0) {                x /= i;                e++;            }            cout << i << " " << e << endl;        }     }    if (x > 1) cout << x << " " << 1 << endl;    cout << endl;}

约数

试除法求约数

void get_divisors(int n) {    vector<int> ans;    for (int i = 1; i <= n / i; i++) {        if (n % i == 0) {            ans.push_back(i);            if (i != n / i) ans.push_back(n / i);        }    }    sort(ans.begin(), ans.end());    for (auto x : ans) cout << x << " ";}

约数的个数

#include <iostream>#include <unordered_map>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int mod = 1e9 + 7;unordered_map<int, int> primes;signed main() {    int t;    cin >> t;    while (t--) {        int n;        cin >> n;        for (int i = 2; i <= n / i; i++) {            while (n % i == 0) {                n /= i;                primes[i]++;            }        }        if (n > 1) primes[n]++;    }    int res = 1;    for (auto x : primes) res = res * (x.second + 1) % mod;     cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

约数之和

#include <iostream>#include <unordered_map>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int mod = 1e9 + 7;unordered_map<int, int> primes;signed main() {    int t;    cin >> t;    while (t--) {        int n;        cin >> n;        for (int i = 2; i <= n / i; i++) {            while (n % i == 0) {                n /= i;                primes[i]++;            }        }        if (n > 1) primes[n]++;    }    int res = 1;    for (auto x : primes) {        int p = x.first, e = x.second;        int sum = 1;        while (e--) sum = (sum * p + 1) % mod;        res = res * sum % mod;    }    cout << res << endl;}

最大公约数

int gcd(int a, int b) {    return b ? gcd(b, a % b) : a;}

欧拉函数

一个数的欧拉函数

#include <iostream>using namespace std;signed main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    while (n--) {        int a;        cin >> a;        int res = a;        for (int i = 2; i <= a / i; i++) {            if (a % i == 0) {                res = res / i * (i - 1);                while (a % i == 0) a /= i;            }        }        if (a > 1) res = res / a * (a - 1);        cout << res << endl;    }    return 0;}

欧拉函数打表

bool st[N];int primes[N];int phi[N];int n;void get_eulers(int n) {    phi[1] = 1;    int cnt = 0;    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {        if (!st[i]) {            primes[cnt++] = i;            phi[i] = i - 1;        }        for (int j = 0; primes[j] <= n / i; j++) {            st[primes[j] * i] = true;            if (i % primes[j] == 0) {                phi[primes[j] * i] = phi[i] * primes[j];                break;            }            phi[primes[j] * i] = phi[i] * (primes[j] - 1);        }    }}

快速幂

次方快速幂

int qpow(int a, int b, int p) {    int res = 1;    while (b) {        if (b & 1) res = res * a % p;        b >>= 1;        a = a * a % p;    }    return res;}

矩阵快速幂

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 3;int n, m;void mul(int c[], int a[], int b[][N]) {    int t[N] = {0};    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {            t[i] = (t[i] + a[j] * b[j][i] % m) % m;        }    }    memcpy(c, t, sizeof t);}void mul(int c[][N], int a[][N], int b[][N]) {    int t[N][N] = {0};    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {            for (int k = 0; k < N; k++) {                t[i][j] = (t[i][j] + a[i][k] * b[k][j] % m) % m;            }        }    }    memcpy(c, t, sizeof t);}signed main() {    cin >> n >> m;    int f[N] = {1, 1, 1};    int a[N][N] = {        {0, 1, 0},        {1, 1, 1},        {0, 0, 1}    };    int b = n - 1;    while (b) {        if (b & 1) mul(f, f, a);        b >>= 1;        mul(a, a, a);    }    cout << f[2] << endl;    return 0;}

扩展欧几里得

int exgcd(int a, int b, int &x, int &y) {    if (!b) {        x = 1, y = 0;        return a;    } else {        int gcd = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x);        y -= a / b * x;        return gcd;    }}

entry.title: 2020ICPC南京M.Monster Hunter
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

一颗树形的地图上有n个结点，每个结点有一只怪兽，每个怪兽有个hp属性，消灭一只怪兽的条件是他的父节点上的怪兽要被消灭，消灭一只怪兽的代价为他的hp加上他还活着的儿子结点上的怪兽的hp，有一种魔法水，它的作用是可以无代价无限制的消灭任何一只怪兽。问使用k(k = 0, 1, 2, … , n)瓶魔法水消灭全部怪兽的最小代价。

解题思路

根据题意知道这是一道树上背包问题，状态f[i][j][k]表示以i为根的子树，消灭j个怪兽，k = 1表示结点i上的怪兽被消灭，k = 0的结点i上的怪兽未被消灭的最小代价。

解题代码

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 2e3 + 5, INF = 1e18;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int w[N];int f[N][N][2];void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int dfs(int u) {    int p = 1;    f[u][0][0] = 0;    f[u][1][1] = w[u];    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int v = e[i];        int sz = dfs(v);        for (int j = p; j >= 0; j--) {            for (int k = 0; k <= sz; k++) {                f[u][j + k][1] = min(f[u][j + k][1], f[u][j][1] + min(f[v][k][0], f[v][k][1] + w[v]));                f[u][j + k][0] = min(f[u][j + k][0], f[u][j][0] + min(f[v][k][0], f[v][k][1]));            }        }        p += sz;    }    return p;}signed main() {    int T;    scanf("%lld", &T);    while (T--) {        int n;        scanf("%lld", &n);        idx = 0;        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) h[i] = -1;        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) f[i][j][1] = f[i][j][0] = INF;        }        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {            int u;            scanf("%lld", &u);            add(u, i);        }        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%lld", &w[i]);        dfs(1);        for (int i = n; i >= 0; i--) {            if (i) printf("%lld ", min(f[1][i][0], f[1][i][1]));            else printf("%lld\n", min(f[1][i][0], f[1][i][1]));        }    }    return 0;}

entry.title: 树形dp
entry.content:
基础树形dp

没有上司的舞会

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 6e3 + 5;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;bool st[N], vis[N];int f[N][2];void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}void dfs(int u) {    vis[u] = 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (vis[j]) continue;        dfs(j);        f[u][1] += f[j][0];        f[u][0] += max(f[j][0], f[j][1]);    }}int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &f[i][1]);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        add(b, a);        st[a] = 1;    }    int res = 0;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (!st[i]) {            dfs(i);            res = max(f[i][0], f[i][1]);            break;        }    }    printf("%d\n", res);    return 0;}

树上背包

选课

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 305;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int f[N][N];int n, m;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int dfs(int u) {    int p = 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int v = e[i];        int sz = dfs(v);        for (int j = min(p, m + 1); j; j--) {            for (int k = 1; k <= sz && k + j <= m + 1; k++) {                f[u][k + j] = max(f[u][k + j], f[u][j] + f[v][k]);            }        }        p += sz;    }    return p;}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        int k;        scanf("%d%d", &k, &f[i][1]);        add(k, i);    }    dfs(0);    printf("%d\n", f[0][m + 1]);    return 0;}

换根dp

STA-Station

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 1e6 + 5, M = N * 2;int h[N], e[M], ne[M], idx;int sz[N], d[N];int f[N];int n;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++; }int dfs1(int u, int fa) {    sz[u] = 1;    d[u] = d[fa] + 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        sz[u] += dfs1(j, u);    }    return sz[u];}void dfs2(int u, int fa) {    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        f[j] = f[u] - sz[j] * 2 + n;        dfs2(j, u);    }}signed main() {    scanf("%lld", &n);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);        add(a, b), add(b, a);    }    dfs1(1, 1);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) f[1] += d[i];    dfs2(1, 1);    int sum = f[1], res = 1;    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {        if (f[i] > sum) {            sum = f[i];            res = i;        }    }    printf("%lld\n", res);    return 0;}

entry.title: ZOJ3080 Binary Numbers
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

一个十进制数的二进制表示中1的位置

解题思路

先讲十进制数转为二进制数存入vector中，在将vector翻转，便于答案记录，最后遍历一遍即可。

题解代码

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;int main() {    int T;    cin >> T;    while (T--) {        int n;        cin >> n;        vector<int> nums;        while (n) nums.push_back(n % 2), n /= 2;        nums.reserve(nums.size());        vector<int> ans;        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {            if (nums[i]) ans.push_back(i);        }        for (int i = 0; i < ans.size(); i++) {            if (i != ans.size() - 1) cout << ans[i] << " ";            else cout << ans[i] << endl;        }    }    return 0;}

entry.title: ZOJ2812 Quicksum
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

给一个字符串按 每个字符位置权值*字符表示的数字的和 计算方法得出一个结果。

解题思路

模拟计算方法即可，注意字符串的读入。

题解代码

#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main() {    string s;    int sum, lens;    while (getline(cin, s) && s[0] != '#') {        sum = 0;        lens = s.length();        for (int i = 0; i < lens; i++) {            if (s[i] != ' ')                sum += (i + 1) * (s[i] - 'A' + 1);        }        cout << sum << endl;    }    return 0;}

entry.title: 2020ICPC南京F.Fireworks
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

制作一个烟花花费的时间是n，放一次烟花花费的时间是m，放一次烟花成功的概率为p，烟花放成功一次就算成功了，以最优策略放烟花，求烟花成功一次花费的时间的最小期望值。

解题思路

假设每制作k个烟花就放一次，时间花费为k * n + m，最少成功一次的概率为1 - (1 - p) ^ k，这是个几何分布，期望为1 / (1 - (1 - p) ^ k)， 花费时间的期望为(k * n + m) / (1 - (1 - p) ^ k)，三分找出k的值，使得时间取得最小值。

解题代码

#include <iostream>#include <cmath>#include <cstdio>using namespace std;const int INF = 1e9;double n, m, p;double f(int mid) {    return (mid * n + m) / (1 - pow(1 - p, mid));}int main() {    int T;    cin >> T;    while (T--) {        scanf("%lf%lf%lf", &n, &m, &p);        p = p * 1e-4;        int l = 0, r = INF;         while (l < r) {            int lm = l + (r - l) / 3;            int rm = r - (r - l) / 3;            if (f(lm) < f(rm)) r = rm - 1;            else l = lm + 1;        }        printf("%.10lf\n", f(r));    }    return 0;}

entry.title: HUD3038 How Many Answers Are Wrong
entry.content:
题目传送门

题目大意

给出一个区间的长度N，及M个子区间和，形如：x y z, 表示子区间[x, y]的和为z。
如果一个“子区间和”与前面的“子区间和”冲突，即为错误（而且这个“子区间和”将在接下来的判断中被忽略）。
求总错误个数。

解题思路

这是一道带权并查集的题，维护子节点与祖先节点的关系d[x], d[x]表示节点x到节点p[x]的区间和。

题解代码

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 2e5 + 5;int p[N], d[N];int find(int x) {    if (p[x] != x) {        int root = find(p[x]);        d[x] += d[p[x]];        p[x] = root;    }    return p[x];}signed main() {    int n, m;    while (cin >> n >> m) {        for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++) {            p[i] = i;            d[i] = 0;        }        int res = 0;        while (m--) {            int x, y, z;            cin >> x >> y >> z;            int px = find(x - 1), py = find(y);            if (px != py) {                p[py] = px;                d[py] = d[x - 1] + z - d[y];            } else res += d[y] - d[x - 1] != z;        }        cout << res << endl;    }    return 0;}
